message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I know you've been looking for something like this, and I truly believe it will be a game-changer for you. Considering the value it brings, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000. What do you think?

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're looking for.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but $750,000 is significantly below the true value of this product. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $900,000. This is a very competitive offer, considering the immense benefits it offers you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still working within my budget constraints. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850,000. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
